MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L37 and L39 postcode areas of Liverpool and Ormskirk, affecting properties in Broad Lane, Wood Lane, Altcar Lane and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation being needed  and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:42 PM on 15th January 2021.
